formData.objectives: Unify data sources into knowledge graph

executiveSummary.problem: Enterprise data silos prevent AI initiatives from reaching their full potential, costing organizations millions in lost opportunities.
executiveSummary.opportunity: A unified knowledge graph platform can unlock 10x faster insights and enable truly intelligent automation across your organization.
executiveSummary.solution: Custom-built AI-ready platform with graph database core, intelligent APIs, and seamless integration capabilities delivered in 90 days.

challenges: Data scattered across 15+ systems with no unified view
Manual data integration taking 40+ hours per analysis
AI models limited by incomplete data relationships

quotes.text: We're sitting on a goldmine of data but can't mine it effectively. Our AI initiatives are stuck in pilot phase because we can't connect the dots across our systems.
quotes.author: Chief Data Officer

objectives: Unify Data Sources: Connect 15+ enterprise systems into single knowledge graph
Accelerate Insights: Reduce analysis time from 40+ hours to < 2 hours
Enable AI Excellence: Provide rich context for ML models

pillars.name: Intelligent Core
pillars.description: Graph database with AI-powered relationship discovery and semantic understanding

pillars.name: Universal Connectors
pillars.description: Pre-built integrations for enterprise systems with real-time synchronization

pillars.name: Insight Engine
pillars.description: Natural language queries with automated insights and recommendation system

solution.techStrategy: Custom-built AI-ready platform delivered in 90 days.

members.name: Jane Doe
members.expertise: Graph database expert with 10+ years experience

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.expertise: Machine learning and natural language processing
